title: National debt of Ireland 2024
yAxis: National debt in billion U.S. dollars
summary: In general National debt in billion U.S. dollars has stayed the same over the Year.
National debt in billion U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2019, and finally slightly increasing from 2019 to 2021.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2020 and 2021.
Maximum National debt in billion U.S. dollars, about 231.85 was reported at Year 2021
Minimum National debt in billion U.S. dollars about 226.92 was reached at Year 2018
min_summary: Overall National debt in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
National debt in billion U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2019, and finally slightly increasing from 2019 to 2021.
mid_summary: Overall National debt in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
National debt in billion U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2018 to 2019, and finally slightly increasing from 2019 to 2021.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2020 and 2021.
Maximum National debt in billion U.S. dollars, about 231.85 was reported at Year 2021
Minimum National debt in billion U.S. dollars about 226.92 was reached at Year 2018
